system.description:
Effect: The Weather becomes Sunny for the next 3 Rounds.

The user may spend up to 6 additional PP, increasing the Power of this attack by 15 per PP spent.

Requirement: User is Dynamaxed and has a Fire-Type attack on the Active List.
